item.title: KDP
item.description: score:115 Chances: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) is positioned for growth across its beverage categories, including coffee and caffeinated beverages. The company has a strong track record of outperforming its peers and delivering shareholder performance. Keurig Dr Pepper’s product portfolio is broad and includes a wide range of popular beverage brands.
